achNames: Inertia Drift:Drift into a black hole
Risky Business:Accept a quest in D4

weapons.name: Stock Gun
weapons.desc: A basic, medium range gun.

weapons.name: Plasma Gun
weapons.desc: Short in range, slow to shoot and slow to recharge, but packs one hell of a punch.

weapons.name: Reverse Gun
weapons.desc: Get off my tail! Basic gun that shoots backwards.

weapons.name: Rifle
weapons.desc: Powerful, long-range, fast bullets. Does a lot of damage. Perfect for shooting at a large swarm of distant enemies.

weapons.name: Shotgun
weapons.desc: This will come in handy in an ambush. Sprays a lot of bullets around where you shoot. Powerful but hard to control.

weapons.name: Machine Gun
weapons.desc: Rapid-fire! Ammunition is a bit weak, but that's no matter if you're shooting 13 rounds per second!

weapons.name: Minigun
weapons.desc: Similar to the machine gun, with two active barrels instead of one. Great weapon if you can aim it quickly.

weapons.name: Plasma Beam
weapons.desc: Automatically aims at the nearest enemy within a small range and fires a beam of plasma.

weapons.name: Laser Beam
weapons.desc: Automatically aims at the nearest enemy within a medium range.

weapons.name: Hadron Beam
weapons.desc: Short-range particle beam accelerator. Does a lot of damage, but takes a while to recharge. Can be used as a quick trump card for close calls.

weapons.name: Missile
weapons.desc: This missile will follow the nearest enemy and explode on impact. If there is no enemy in range, it will simply go straight. Be careful, though: it is relatively slow and can be outrun by quick enemies.

weapons.name: Heavy Missile
weapons.desc: A slower missile that does more damage. Good tool against slower, stronger ships.

weapons.name: EMP Missile
weapons.desc: Short-range missile that both damages the enemy and paralyzes them. Use one when attacking a fast enemy head-on to stun them before they can dodge any guided projectiles.

weapons.name: Missile Swarm
weapons.desc: Fires a single missile which splits into a swarm of missiles which will attack a large horde of enemies. Great tool to use against a large ambush.

weapons.name: Torpedo
weapons.desc: Ultra long-range fast missile.

weapons.name: Mine
weapons.desc: A simple mine. It's hard for an enemy to follow you with these. Explodes on impact with an enemy ship.

weapons.name: Laser Mine
weapons.desc: Fires high-power laser at enemies that get too close.

weapons.name: EMP Mine
weapons.desc: Mine that does damage and also paralyzes enemies for a short time on collision. Useful when you are being chased.

weapons.name: Hull Nanobots
weapons.desc: Repairs you nice and quick on the go.

weapons.name: Photon Cloak
weapons.desc: Disguise yourself for a quick getaway.

weapons.name: Generator
weapons.desc: For each generator you carry, your weapons and energy charge 4% faster, but you turn a tenth slower.

weapons.name: Turbo
weapons.desc: Supplements your engine for greater acceleration. Output increases while drifting.

weapons.name: Hyperdrive
weapons.desc: Single-use long range speed boost.

weapons.name: Pulse Wave
weapons.desc: Creates an explosion pushing all nearby enemy ships away.

weapons.name: Electromagnet
weapons.desc: Repels objects away from you. With practice, you can fling asteroids and mines at enemies, causing damage. Very effective against bases, but you do not recieve exp/bounty for killing a base with an asteroid.

weapons.name: EMP Blast
weapons.desc: Fires a beam which disables all ships it hits. Single-use.

weapons.name: Mining Laser
weapons.desc: Similar to the Laser Beam but only attacks asteroids and does more damage.

weapons.name: Turret
weapons.desc: Place a base turret. Fly over it to claim the kills and money that it earns. Single-use. Only one turret is allowed per sector.

weapons.name: Gravity Bomb
weapons.desc: Creates a small temporary black hole upon explosion. Be cautious with this weapon- you need to get far enough away before it implodes. The vortex will wait until it is at least 500 units from a base before deploying. Single-use.

weapons.name: Warp Drive
weapons.desc: Instant speed boost for fast getaways.

weapons.name: Ore Cannon
weapons.desc: Stronger than mining laser!

weapons.name: Destabilizer
weapons.desc: Destabilizes nearest enemy ship for 10 seconds by disrupting gyroscopic function.

weapons.name: Impulse Mine
weapons.desc: Soon after deployed, this mine will explode and push every nearby player away without doing damage. Useful for moving quickly, just place one behind you and ride the shockwave.

weapons.name: Grenades
weapons.desc: Throw this at an enemy and it will explode soon (or as soon as it collides with an enemy), damaging their ship and knocking them back!

weapons.name: Muon Ray
weapons.desc: An extremely powerful beam weapon that must be aimed. Fires a high energy particle beam in the direction that your ship is facing which will do extremely heavy damage to anything it contacts. Can pass through multiple ships.

weapons.name: Jammer
weapons.desc: Discharges the weapons of anyone it hits, and prevents them from shooting for a short while after.

weapons.name: Supercharger
weapons.desc: For about a minute, all damage inflicted on your ship will double, but you will also double in energy regeneration, thrust, and agility. Single-use.

weapons.name: Energy Disk
weapons.desc: Fires a homing orb which tracks your nearest opponent!

weapons.name: Proximity Fuze
weapons.desc: Non-tracking missile that explodes when nearby an enemy.

weapons.name: Spreadshot
weapons.desc: Three active barrels! The bullets come out at consistent angles, unlike shotgun.

weapons.name: Submachinegun
weapons.desc: Fires similarly to Minigun, but in 5-round bursts.

weapons.name: Hypno Ray
weapons.desc: Fire this beam at a drone and it will follow you until it dies. Single-use.

weapons.name: Photon Orb
weapons.desc: Tracks players with Photon Cloak, but does not do as much damage as most other weapons.

Our whole universe was in a hot, dense state
Putting turrets in the black hole

Protip: Kill top players to gain experience... and enemies!
Protip: The middle sector has a black hole- Be careful!
Protip: Upgrading radar lets you see more than asteroids, players and bases!
Protip: Ores in the enemy's land are more valuable!
Protip: Unlock all achievements of a color for a trail!
Protip: Press P to engage autopilot!
Protip: Hadron beam will electrically charge asteroids!
Protip: Quickly alternate A and D while drifting to speed up!
Protip: Always keep track of your lives!
Protip: The more ore you're carrying, the slower you move!
Driving on parkways and parking on driveways
According to all known laws of aviation
Who lives in a pineapple under the sea
If you or a loved one has been diagnosed with mesothelioma
日本語を話しています
Protip: Weapons do double damage if you say 'pew' when you shoot!
lore: Humans lack self-awareness. After destroying their planet of origin in armed conflict, they spread from solar system to solar system, polluting worlds and eliminating life. We tried to let them know that their behavior would ultimately be self-destructive, but they refused to listen. They continued to migrate unsustainably around the galaxy, so we stepped in with force. We decided to only attack new colonies of Humans near our own settlements to maintain influence in our share of the galaxy, but the humans reacted violently. They immediately attacked without restraint. We called for resources from neighboring galaxies but reinforcements will not arrive for several decades, so until then, we must suppress the Human crusade for the sake of our own lives, and for the fate of this galaxy.

Ever since we lost planet Earth, the Human race has been hanging on to its existence by a thread- we left our solar system in search of other habitable planets with the sole hope of survival, but very few of them demonstrated promise for long-term settlement. Barren planets unsustainable of supporting life were terraformed into industrious planets to generate the resources we desperately needed to survive in alien worlds. After centuries of toil, the population began to grow and spread. For about a decade we lived in peace and prosperity, until a hostile force attacked. Maintaining our settlements was vital to our survival, so we had no option other than to fight back. Ever since, we have been in conflict with the alien race, and it's unlikely that this war won't end in either civilization's extinction. Please, help us emerge from this struggle alive.
